meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vast.
meanings.sent1: The vastities of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The desert's vastities stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent3: The vastities of the fridge seemed to magically disappear the leftovers.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe of vastities waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The vastities of space filled his dreams with wonder and awe.

meanings.sent1: The vastities of the forest were home to many creatures.
meanings.sent2: The vastities of the field seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent3: The vastities of the parking lot made finding a spot a challenge.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt the vastities of love for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The vastities of the sky at night were filled with twinkling stars.
